panels.title: Reconciling Count

panels.description: How long in seconds an item stays in workqueue before being requested
panels.title: Work Queue Latency

panels.description: How many seconds of work has been done that is in progress and hasn't been observed by work_duration. Large values indicate stuck threads. One can deduce the number of stuck threads by observing the rate at which this increases
panels.title: Work Queue, Unfinished work

panels.description: How many seconds has the longest running processor for workqueue been running
panels.title: Work Queue, Longest Running

panels.description: Total number of retries handled by workqueue
panels.title: Work Queue Retries

panels.description: How long in seconds processing an item from workqueue takes
panels.title: Workqueue - Work Duration

panels.description: Total number of adds handled by workqueue
panels.title: Work Queue Add Rate

panels.description: A summary of the GC invocation durations.
panels.title: GC Duration Mean
